summary_text.text: Great news - your business operations are in good shape to support your business objectives
Your business operations are able to support the needs of your business today, but improvements could be made to ensure you are ready for the future.
From your answers, significant improvements to your business operations could be made to keep you ahead of the competition.
Based on your answers, your business operations are in need of review and improvement to keep you competitive and ready for the future.
Based on your survey answers, the {SECTOR_NAME} category is not applicable to your readiness report.
Great news - based on your answers your employees are motivated and have tools to be productive to support your business objectives
Your employees have most of the tools in place to effectively support your business, but there are ways you could get greater productivity and collaboration.
We believe that your employees could be more connected allowing them to be productive wherever they are.
You are not getting the most from your employees, you need to improve how they communicate to get the most from them.
Based on your survey answers, the {SECTOR_NAME} category is not applicable to your readiness report.
You understand your customers needs and are able to interact with them how they want.
You understand your customers needs, but could make improvements to how you interact with them to provide a higher level of service.
You need to understand more about your customers and how they want to interact with your business to build stronger relationships.
Your answers suggest that you need to improve the way you interact with your customers to remain competitive.
Based on your survey answers, the {SECTOR_NAME} category is not applicable to your readiness report.
